content: A sensor with on-board signal conditioning, ADC, and a small processor (often cortex-M) integrated on the same die or package. Outputs calibrated digital data over I2C/SPI instead of raw analog voltage. Examples: MEMS accelerometers (Bosch BMA400), environmental sensors (BME680). Offloads filtering and fusion from the host MCU, reducing I/O traffic and CPU load. sensor cortex-M MCU
